<noinclude>{{month|August}}
Events that occurred on 12 August
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1911]]''' - Voice actor [[Felix Felton]] is born.
* '''[[1916]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 5]].
* '''[[1944]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 78]].
* '''[[1955]]''' - During the holiday trip to Italy, [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his daughter [[Priscilla Tolkien|Priscilla]] attend High Mass at the [[Wikipedia:Basilica di Santa Chiara|Basilica di Santa Chiara in Assisi]].
* '''[[1959]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 216]].
* '''[[1978]]''' - [[Mythcon 9]] in [[wikipedia:West Sacramento, California|West Sacramento]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1983]]''' - [[Mythcon 14]] at [[wikipedia:Scripps College|Scripps College]] in [[wikipedia:Claremont, California|Claremont]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1984]]''' - [[Mythcon 15]] at [[wikipedia:Mills College|Mills College]] in [[wikipedia:Oakland, California|Oakland]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[2004]]''' - Voice actor [[Peter Woodthorpe]] dies.
* '''[[2005]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s [[Tolkien 2005]] conference in [[wikipedia:Birmingham|Birmingham]], [[wikipedia:England|England]].
* '''[[2011]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Cantea] - 4th International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[wikipedia:Valencia|Valencia]], [[wikipedia:Spain|Spain]].
* '''[[2017]]''' - [[Omentielva|Omentielva Otsea]] - the Seventh International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages at [[wikipedia:California State University, East Bay|California State University, East Bay]].
* '''[[2025]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2026]]'' is published.
